title: Loginqueue in aaram
body:
Well... I wanted to Queue for aaram to get my afk Penalty away. 
I accepted all game invites but i couldnt connect to the game.  I still was in Champion select and could even reroll my Champion (even though i didnt get another one ingame). 
Because of that i just wasted more than 40 minutes to connect to a game. 
btw. Im writing this while im still working off my afk Penalty.

This text showed up :
>         Unknown Error
An unknown error has occured
Sorry about that. We've sent a Report to the Server.
If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the Support site or Forum for more Information.

I wanted to log out but then this text showed up
> Exit Now ?
 If you Exit the game now you will receive a time Penalty that will stop either you or your Team from entering any match made game! It will also end your league series if you are in one. Are you sure you want to leave?

Well yeah 
I pressed yes and reconnected to the game playing the right Champion i should. (gnar)
I didnt get a Penalty by now but if I'll get one  I am going to write another post. 

I hope i can get away my Penalty now ;) 

-KingTwin{{champion:150}}

replies.body:
Excuse me, but you are in the rong Board. This is the german one, where People talk german. If you want to contact Riot, please do that through the Support at the top of the Page. They will help you as fast as they can. But if you post it in the Boards, "only" the Players will help you.

MfG Sirius00{{champion:15}}
